String.string: Clue of Hope
"Don't you believe me?"
"How did you know?"
Report to Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter the Allemantheia Headquarters.]
"I understand."
City Teleportal
This is the City Teleportal Fraya was talking about.
Go to the Allemantheia City Teleportal.
Front of Mysterium
You hear people talking about argon research.
Use the City Teleportal to go to the Mysterium at the Arcane Symposium.
They're back to work. You can feel the tension.
Use the City Teleportal to go to the Mysterium at the Arcane Symposium.
Go to {@linkcreature:72#1111#Ryshan}.
Combine the Argon Structure fragment to the withered leaf. [Press key to open inventory and use Argon Structure Fragment.]
The two objects combined to make a new one!
"I'll answer as best as I can."
Deliver the argonized leaf to Ryshan.
"Okay. I trust you."
"I can't. It's classified."
Ask Ryshan what he wants to know about Stepstone Isle.
"Right. Okay."
"I'll pass that along."
Speak with Malachai.
"Yes, ma'am."
Bring Malachai's request to Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters and tell her what happened at the Mysterium.
